title: Why recite Qunoot after ruku when Sahih Bukhari says it should be done before ruku? assim al hakeem
transcript: I had a question about in So you say we have to do it after the r and it is fine if you do it before too but inar I read a where Malik said that it should be before and not after so why do we do it after theu because it was reported that it was done after the recur what's a problem in that an Malik may Allah be pleased with him if this Hadith as you've reported is regarding the which is the Dua it did not say that it can't be after the rec as in the Hadith of Hass may Allah be pleased with him and with his father when the when he came to his grandfather sallallahu alaih wasallam and asked him about the Dua in he told him to say Allah and the vast majority of Scholars say that this is after the the is also referring to the length of standing in reciting the Quran so this may be also understood from the Hadith of an that before the r the Sunnah is to prolong your standing in reciting the Quran especially in F because this is a blessed time and this is part of the Sunnah and Allah knows best
